Article Title: April 13 – Saudi Arabia halts short-term visa for India & others, IPL: MI vs DC & RR VS RCB
Article Text:
India-Africa naval drill

to kick off in Tanzania

Amit Shah to visit Bhopal

Saudi Arabia halts short-term visas for India, 13 other nations

ICC Board meet in Harare to review major format changes

IPL 2025: MI vs DC in Delhi

IPL 2025: RR vs RCB in Jaipur

•

Other key events

•

•

Sta'TOI'stics

Anniversaries

Unlocking the past

Navy Chief Admiral Dinesh K Tripathi is in Tanzania to attend the maiden Africa-India Key Maritime Engagement (AIKEYME) naval exercise in Dar-es-Salaam. Co-hosted by the Indian Navy and the Tanzania People's Defence Force, the six-day wargames includes participation from 10 African nations.The Union home minister will attend the 'Gopal Sammelan,' a gathering of state-level cooperative milk producers. An agreement will be signed among the National Dairy Development Board, the state government and milk unions.Saudi Arabia is suspending the issuance of new short-term visas for citizens of 14 countries, including India, Pakistan and Egypt. The decision is intended to prevent the misuse of non-Hajj visas and manage overcrowding during the pilgrimage season. Travelers with existing visas must enter the country by today and depart by April 29.The International Cricket Council Board will review key rule changes proposed by the ICC Cricket Committee, led by Sourav Ganguly. Discussions will be on possible revision of the two-balls rule in ODIs, introducing a clock timer to monitor over rates in Test matches and changing the U19 Men’s World Cup from 50-over to T20 format.Delhi Capitals, undefeated this year under Axar Patel, face Mumbai Indians, a team plagued by poor starts and underwhelming bowling.Both Royal Challengers Bengaluru and Rajasthan Royals aim to bounce back from recent defeats in this crucial showdown. RCB will wear green jerseys to promote sustainability and carbon-neutral initiatives.• Union minister Piyush Goyal to inaugurate Vibrant Buildcon 2025 , India's largest building material and construction expo, at Yashobhoomi convention centre in Delhi• FIDE Women's Grand Prix 5th leg to be held in Pune from today• Farmers in Pakistan to begin nationwide protest against corporate farming• Futuristic World Expo 2025 to open for public in Osaka, Japan• Celebration of Palm Sunday that marks the beginning of the Holy Week for Christians• Jallianwala Bagh massacre in Amritsar on this day in 1919 – British army’s colonel Reginald Dyer ordered his troops to fire at a crowd of unarmed protesters and pilgrims• Birth anniversary of Father of Indian cinema, director and producer Dadasaheb Torne, who made India's first feature film• Birth anniversary of third US President Thomas Jefferson• Tiger Woods at 21 years old became the youngest golfer to win the Masters Tournament in 1997• Hungary became a republic in 1849
Article Summary: Saudi arabia halts short-term visas for india, 13 other nations. Icc board meet in harare to review major format changes. Ipl 2025: mi vs dc in delhi. Fide women's grand prix 5th leg to be held in pune.

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs RCB: Team prediction, head-to-head, Sawai Mansingh Stadium pitch report, Jaipur weather update
Article Text:
Royal Challengers Bengaluru's Virat Kohli (second left) with Rajasthan Royals' captain Sanju Samson, Head Coach Rahul Dravid and others during a practice session ahead of an Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 T20 cricket match at Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

RR vs RCB: Sawai Mansingh Stadium pitch report

IPL: RCB mentor Karthik questions Chinnaswamy pitch after twin defeats

RR vs RCB: Playing XI team prediction

RR vs RCB: Squads

Why Washington Sundar credits Gautam Gambhir for improving his game?

Rajasthan Royals Squad:

Royal Challengers Bengaluru Squad:

RR vs RCB: Head-to-head

RR vs RCB: Jaipur weather report

Adapting to a single home venue has been tough for some teams, but the Rajasthan Royals (RR) have a double challenge ahead. After starting their campaign in Guwahati, they are set to return to the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur nearly three weeks into IPL 2025 , looking to recover from an uneven start.They’ll be facing the Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) today (April 13) afternoon, who are in remarkable form on the road. RCB achieved notable away victories: defeating the Mumbai Indians (MI) at Wankhede for the first time in a decade, beating Chennai Super Kings (CSK) at Chepauk after 17 years, and overcoming the defending champions, Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR), at Eden Gardens.On the road, RCB boast of impressive numbers: averaging 39.6 runs per wicket and scoring at a rate of 10.5 runs per over. In contrast, their home average drops significantly to 22.1 and 8.3, respectively. Their bowling has also been effective away, with an average of 21.2 compared to a higher 56.4 at home.Although they had some time to adjust during previous travels this season, they face a quick turnaround now, having played just two nights ago against the Delhi Capitals (DC).The challenge for the curators at Sawai Mansingh Stadium would be to ensure the surface isn't too dry under the searing Jaipur heat, especially for a day game.Rajasthan Royals predicted lineup: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson(c), Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel(w), Shimron Hetmyer, Wanindu Hasaranga/ Fazalhaq Farooqi, Jofra Archer, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Kumar KartikeyaRoyal Challengers Bengaluru predicted lineup: Philip Salt, Virat Kohli, Devdutt Padikkal, Rajat Patidar(c), Liam Livingstone/ Jacob Bethell, Jitesh Sharma(w), Tim David, Krunal Pandya, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash Dayal, Suyash SharmaYashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson(w/c), Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Shimron Hetmyer, Shubham Dubey, Jofra Archer, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kumar Kartikeya, Yudhvir Singh Charak, Kunal Singh Rathore, Akash Madhwal, Kwena Maphaka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Ashok Sharma, Vaibhav SuryavanshiPhilip Salt, Virat Kohli, Devdutt Padikkal, Rajat Patidar(c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma(w), Krunal Pandya, Tim David, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash Dayal, Suyash Sharma, Rasikh Dar Salam, Manoj Bhandage, Jacob Bethell, Swapnil Singh, Lungi Ngidi, Romario Shepherd, Nuwan Thushara, Mohit Rathee, Swastik Chikara, Abhinandan SinghRoyal Challengers Bengaluru and Rajasthan Royals have a close head-to-head record. In the 32 IPL matches between them, RCB have won 15 and RR have won 14 with three ending without an outcome.In IPL 2024, RR did a double over RCB. The reverse was true in IPL 2023 where RCB triumphed in both their games. Go back to IPL 2022 and there was a third clash between these two, in the playoffs, where RR had come out top.The temperature in Jaipur is expected to be unforgiving for the players in the day game (3:30pm IST start). The mercury is expected to reach as high as 37-38 degrees Celsius with no rain to offer respite.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) face rajasthan royals (rr) at sawai mansingh stadium in jaipur. Rcb are in remarkable form on the road, averaging 39.6 runs per wicket and scoring at a rate of 10.5 runs per over. Rr have started their ipl 2025 campaign in guwahati. Royal challengers bengaluru and rajasthan royals have a close head-to-head record.

Article Title: Red Sox Fan Catches Foul Ball Using Fried Dough
Article Text:
Boston fan uses fried dough to catch foul ball in Red Sox victory over Blue Jays (Image Source: X)

Red Sox fan makes perfect catch using fried dough as glove " Knuckleball Sandwich !" Red Sox foul ball moment sparks memory of last year's wild catch During a Toronto Blue Jays and Boston Red Sox game, something funny occurred. A Boston Red Sox fan received a foul ball while he sat close to the field. The ball was not caught by his glove or by hand, but by fried dough ! The clip went viral instantly on the web, and everyone everywhere is talking about it. It turned a typical game into a fun experience for the huge gathering of people both inside and outside the stadium.The game was going on as usual. Bo Bichette hit a foul ball into the stands. It flew into the stands where fans were sitting. Fans all looked around to see who got the ball. To everyone's surprise, the guy in his Red Sox shirt got up, and in his hand was the ball, resting perfectly on his fried dough.The catch video was shared on social media and it started spreading quickly. People were commenting things likeand joking about how fortunate the fan was. Some even asked if he still consumed the fried dough afterward!It doesn't happen every day that you witness someone catching a ball with something to eat. This episode illustrated how thrilling and surprising baseball matches can be.Something far more terrible happened last year during a game. Another foul ball thrown by Bo Bichette went into the stands and hit a woman named Liz McGuire on the head. It was an extremely scary situation because the ball had an over 100 mph speed. She was not severely hurt and even got baseball cards and tickets afterward as a gesture of goodwill from the team.This season's fried dough moment was much lighter and gave fans a reason to talk. It also illustrated how foul balls can make big memories, both humorous and somber. Even the Red Sox players and commentators laughed. Moments like these are why fans love going to baseball games. You never know what amusing surprise is going to happen.Also Read: Alex Bregman’s Contract With Red Sox - Exploring Timeline, Career Earnings And Everything Else
Article Summary: Boston red sox fan uses fried dough to catch foul ball in red sox victory over blue jays. The ball was not caught by his glove or by hand, but by fried dough! The clip went viral instantly on the web, and everyone everywhere is talking about it.

Article Title: Disqualified from Olympics for being overweight, Vinesh Phogat opts for Rs 4 crore over government job
Article Text:
Vinesh Phogat (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Wrestler-turned-politician Vinesh Phogat has opted for a cash prize of Rs 4 crore from the Haryana government after being offered benefits equivalent to an Olympic silver medallist.The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 Paris Olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.Also See: CSK vs KKR Live Score, IPL 2025 Phogat, a three-time Olympian, had led protests against the former Wrestling Federation of India (WFI) chief Brij Bhushan Singh .She successfully contested the Haryana Assembly elections from Julana in Jind district last year on a Congress ticket.Recently, the Haryana government offered Phogat three choices under its sports policy: a cash prize of Rs 4 crore, an Outstanding Sportsperson (OSP) job under Group 'A', or a Haryana Shehri Vikas Pradhikaran (HSVP) plot.After considering the options, Phogat submitted a letter to the state sports department on Tuesday, informing them of her decision to accept the cash award, official sources confirmed it to PTI.Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini had previously announced that the Haryana cabinet had decided to offer Phogat benefits equivalent to those of an Olympic silver medallist under the state's sports policy.During the Haryana Assembly's Budget Session in March, Phogat had reminded Saini of his promise to honour her like a medallist after her disqualification from the Paris Olympics."It is not about money, it is about respect. Many people from across the state tell me that I must have received the cash award," Phogat said.Saini acknowledged that Phogat was disqualified from the Paris Olympics due to a procedural decision and called her "Haryana's pride".He assured that he would not allow her honour to be diminished.
Article Summary: Vinesh phogat has opted for a cash prize of rs 4 crore from the haryana government. The 30-year-old athlete was disqualified from the 2024 paris olympics for being overweight ahead of her gold medal bout in the 50-kg category.

Article Title: “Justin Bieber and Harry Styles f**ked Taylor Swift”: Kanye West's late-night Twitter spree includes shocking and graphic claims about Taylor Swift

He claimed past relationships with Ashley Olsen and Madonna, and questioned JAY-Z's marriage. West also targeted Tyler, The Creator, and made bizarre statements about his past lives, sparking widespread reactions.

He apologized to jay-z for past insults while making shocking allegations against taylor swift, justin bieber, and harry styles. West also targeted tyler, the creator, and made bizarre statements about his past lives.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin's wife Anastasia Shubskaya gets $280K diamond ring from Wayne Gretzky’s wife after record-breaking goal
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin with wife Anastasia Shubskaya, former NHL player Wayne Gretzky, and Gretzky's wife Janet Jones after scoring his 895th career goal (via Getty Images)


A goal for the ages: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's 26-year record FULL Alex Ovechkin Celebration Ceremony After Record-Breaking Goal No. 895 A legacy passed down: Anastasia Shubskaya receives diamond tribute from Janet Gretzky After Alex Ovechkin netted his 895th career goal and broke legendary Wayne Gretzky 's record, Janet Gretzky showed respect to a time-honored hockey tradition by gifting Anastasia Shubskaya , wife of Alex Ovechkin, an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000. The Capitals may have lost to the New York Islanders by a score of 4-1, but the outcome was an afterthought to a night all about legacy, love, and a new chapter in hockey's history.The moment of history arrived at 7:26 of the second period. Alex Ovechkin let go of a blazing shot through fellow Russian Ilya Sorokin, making himself the NHL's all-time leading goal scorer. Fans inside UBS Arena lost their minds, and Alex Ovechkin commemorated the occasion by executing a belly flop onto the ice—celebrating his big achievement.Alex Ovechkin celebrated this achievement in a pregame ceremony against the Carolina Hurricanes on April 10, 2025. He was given a six-foot sculptural painting by TYP depicting his skates and game-used sticks, with his image on it, with “Most Goals All Time” written on the top and “895 Alex Ovechkin 895” on the bottom.While Alex Ovechkin was absorbing the enormity of his achievement, Anastasia Shubskaya was gifted a symbolic token of the historic night. Continuing a tradition started in 1994, when Colleen Howe (wife of Gordie Howe) gave Janet Gretzky a diamond ring after her husband, Wayne Gretzky, broke Colleen Howe’s husband’s record, Janet Gretzky ensured history repeated itself—this time from one hockey family to another.In an interview with the media, Wayne Gretzky said, “A month ago, my wife said, ‘You know, Colleen Howe started a tradition. I’m not sure if anyone is going to break Alex’s record, but I want to give her (Ovechkin’s wife, Anastasia Shubskaya) something really unique.’ So, we went out and she picked out an eight-diamond ring for Alex’s wife. Not only do hockey guys pass down traditions. So do the families and wives.”The act not only spanned generations of greatness but also underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.Anastasia Shubskaya, who tied the knot with Alex Ovechkin in 2016, is a Russian model who has appeared in numerous Russian magazines during her career and has built a strong social media presence. They are proud parents of two sons- Sergei and Ilya.Also read: “Now the real stuff is coming”: Alex Ovechkin skips The Tonight Show appearance to stay playoff-ready Even though the Capitals fell on the evening, the larger context is one of hope. The team had already secured a playoff berth and now has the emotional tailwind of reaching a once-a-generation milestone. With the NHL playoffs coming, Alex Ovechkin and the Washington Capitals aim to ride the wave of history toward what would be a fairy tale conclusion to the 2025 campaign.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 895th career goal against the new york islanders on april 10, 2025. Wife anastasia shubskaya was gifted an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000 by wayne gretzky's wife janet. The act not only spanned generations of greatness but underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after SRH vs PBKS match
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma (BCCI/IPL Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Why Washington Sundar credits Gautam Gambhir for improving his game?

NEW DELHI: Sunrisers Hyderabad pulled off one of the most memorable chases in IPL history as Abhishek Sharma ’s breathtaking 141 off 55 balls helped them overhaul Punjab Kings ’ massive 245-run total with remarkable ease. Chasing 246, SRH reached the target in just 18.3 overs with eight wickets in hand, thanks to Abhishek's brutal assault and a solid 66 off 37 by Travis Head. Their 171-run opening partnership dismantled Punjab’s bowling and overshadowed Shreyas Iyer’s 36-ball 82 for PBKS.With this emphatic victory, Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) climbed to eighth place on the IPL 2025 points table . They now have 4 points from 6 matches with 2 wins and 4 losses. Their Net Run Rate (NRR) stands at -1.245, reflecting a few heavy defeats despite this record win.Punjab Kings (PBKS), despite the defeat, remain in sixth position with 6 points from 5 matches, having won 3 and lost 2. Their NRR is slightly positive at +0.065, keeping them in the top half of the table.At the top, Delhi Capitals continue to lead with 4 wins in 4 matches and a superior NRR of +1.278, making them the only unbeaten team in the tournament so far.Following them are Gujarat Titans and Lucknow Super Giants, both with 8 points from 6 matches but separated by Net Run Rate — GT with +1.081 and LSG with +0.162.Kolkata Knight Riders sit in fourth place, having won 3 of their 6 matches. Their strong NRR of +0.803 gives them an edge over RCB and PBKS, who also have 6 points but lower NRRs. RCB, in particular, are at fifth with +0.539.Rajasthan Royals have had a shaky campaign, managing just 2 wins in 5 matches. Their NRR is -0.733, placing them in seventh spot.Mumbai Indians are second from bottom with just 1 win from 5 matches and an NRR of -0.010.At the bottom are Chennai Super Kings, enduring a rare poor season. With only 1 win and 5 losses, they sit at the tenth spot with an NRR of -1.554 — the worst in the league.
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad beat punjab kings by eight wickets in ipl 2025. Abhishek sharma top scored with 141 off 55 balls for srh. Delhi capitals lead the table with 4 wins in 4 matches. Rajasthan royals have had a shaky campaign with just 2 wins in 5 matches.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin, the Greatest Of All Time, sets the tone, and the Washington Capitals boys follow it
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)





Alex Ovechkin receives a goat for being the NHL’s all-time leading goal scorer

’

’

“It’s only one love, I love Dynamo, and I love Capitals,” shared Alex Ovechkin at the GR8 City Celebration

Also Read:

“This is the time of year when you have to prepare yourself for big games, so, yeah, I try to set the tone, and I think the boys follow it, so it’s good.” shared Washington Capitals captain Alex Ovechkin at the post-win conference with NHL.com. The Washington Capitals marked their thrilling stance by winning against the Carolina Hurricanes with a riveting score of 5-4 on April 11, 2025.The Alex Ovechkin-led team now boasts 50 wins, 19 losses, and 9 overtime losses. Today, the Washington Capitals will face the Columbus Blue Jackets at 10 pm ET. Will the team follow Alex Ovechkin’s lead? Or will it not? Only time will tell. For now, let’s celebrate the G.O.A.T ! Let's celebrate the leader who sets the tone for the Washington Capitals boys.“When did you first kinda start thinking - okay, it’s within reach, I can do this?” asked NHL Insider for the Sportsnet, Tarik El Bashir , at the GR8 City Celebration at Capital One Arena, addressing Alex Ovechkin about chasing Wayne Gretzkys 894 career NHL goals record.“I think when I have, like, five or six goals,” replied Alex Ovechkin.Alex Ovechkin receives an actual goat for being the G.O.A.T. Greatest Of All Time. An off-white, cute, little, furry baby goat was gifted to Alex Ovechkin. The goat was gifted to 39 YO Alex Ovechkin on the stage by 37 YO Swedish professional ice hockey center and alternate captain for the Washington Capitals, Nicklas Backstrom .Backstrom said, “We now present to you the goat,” before gifting the goat to Alex Ovechkin. Official X account of Washington Capitals called Nicklas-Backstrom-gifting-Alex-Ovechkin-a-goat moment, “of course its nicky with the assist.”Alex Ovechkin then poses with the baby goat, and the official X account of the Capitals called that moment - “goat²”, meaning - two goats in one frame! The goat goat. And The Greatest Of All Time - Alex Ovechkin!Alex Ovechkin has played for only two hockey teams till now. One is the Washington Capitals, as you all know. The other is his former team, FC Dynamo Moscow, from the Russian Premier League (RPL). Ovechkin started his professional career by playing for Dynamo Moscow in 2001.For four seasons, Ovechkin was with the Dynamo Moscow. And in 2004, Alex Ovechkin was drafted by the Washington Capitals. Talking about his former team, Ovechkin shared at the GR8 City Celebration, “If you love, you love, you know? It’s only one love. I love Dynamo, and I love Capitals.”
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin is the nhl’s all-time leading goal scorer with 894 goals. The washington capitals captain received a goat for being the g.o.a.t. Greatest of all time. The official x account of washington capitals called nicklas-backstrom-gifting-alex-ovechkins-a-goat moment, “of course its nicky with the assist”

Article Title: Virat Kohli: Watch: Virat Kohli shares a heartfelt hug with Rahul Dravid ahead of RR vs RCB IPL 2025 clash
Article Text:
Virat Kohli hugs Rahul Dravid in Jaipur. (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: On the eve of the much-anticipated IPL 2025 clash between Rajasthan Royals and Royal Challengers Bengaluru , cricket fans were treated to a special off-field moment as Virat Kohli shared a heartfelt hug with Rahul Dravid at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur on Saturday.Dravid, currently serving as Rajasthan Royals’ head coach, is recovering from a leg injury he sustained while playing in a Karnataka State Cricket Association League match. Despite being confined to a wheelchair with a cast on his left leg, the ever-dedicated Dravid has stayed deeply involved with the Royals’ campaign.Also See: IPL Live Score The emotional meeting was captured and shared by RR on social media, where Kohli, spotting Dravid from a distance, walked over, knelt down, and embraced the former India head coach. Laughter followed, as the two legends shared a warm exchange that instantly won over fans.RR’s caption summed it up perfectly: “Whether you’re a young one or number 18, pehle toh Rahul bhai se hi milna hai.”Dravid’s enduring mentorship and Kohli’s heartfelt gesture brought a refreshing pause to the intense IPL atmosphere, reminding fans of the deep-rooted camaraderie in Indian cricket.As for the on-field action, Kohli and Phil Salt will face the fiery pace of Jofra Archer when the two sides battle on Sunday. Both RCB and RR are looking to bounce back after recent losses — RCB to Delhi Capitals, and RR to Gujarat Titans.Currently, RCB sit fourth with three wins, while RR is at seventh, desperate to climb the table.
Article Summary: Virat kohli hugs rahul dravid in jaipur. The emotional meeting was captured and shared by rr on social media. The two legends shared a warm exchange that instantly won over fans. Both rcb and rr are looking to bounce back after recent losses.

Article Title: 'Mere se pucho na': Shreyas Iyer yells out at umpire for ignoring him and taking Glenn Maxwell's DRS signal
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer yelled out at the umpire during the match between Sunrisers Hyderabad and Punjab Kings in Hyderabad. (Image: Screenshot)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

From golden duck to 39-ball ton! Priyansh Arya follows Ricky Ponting's first-ball six advice

Sunrisers Hyderabad secured an impressive eight-wicket victory against Punjab Kings in a high-scoring IPL match at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad on Saturday. Abhishek Sharma's spectacular 141 off 55 balls helped Hyderabad chase down 246 runs, marking the second-highest successful chase in IPL history.The match saw Punjab Kings post a formidable total of 245 for six, powered by Shreyas Iyer 's explosive 82 off 36 deliveries. However, their efforts were overshadowed by Sharma's masterclass, which included 10 sixes and 14 fours in his maiden IPL century.A notable incident occurred in the fifth over of Sunrisers' chase when Glenn Maxwell disagreed with a wide ball decision. Maxwell called for a DRS review, bypassing team captain Iyer, which led to visible frustration from the Punjab skipper."Umpire, Pehle merese pucho na (ask me first)," Iyer seemed to say to the umpire, who had accepted Maxwell's review request without consulting the captain, contrary to standard protocol.Abhishek Sharma's innings of 141 now stands as the third-highest individual score in IPL history, following Chris Gayle's unbeaten 175 for Royal Challengers Bengaluru in 2013 and Brendon McCullum's unbeaten 158 for Kolkata Knight Riders in 2008.The victory proved crucial for Sunrisers Hyderabad as it ended their four-match losing streak. The team successfully chased down the target, reaching 247-2 in 18.3 overs.This win marked Hyderabad's second victory of the season, their first coming against Rajasthan Royals in their opening game last month. The result has positioned Sunrisers Hyderabad at eighth place in the points table. Meanwhile, Punjab Kings suffered their second loss in five games, and now occupy sixth position in the standings.
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad beat punjab kings by eight wickets in ipl match. Abhishek sharma's 141 off 55 balls helped hyderabad chase down 246 runs. Shreyas iyer's 82 off 36 deliveries was overshadowed by sharma's masterclass. Victory ends hyderabad's four-match losing streak.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shows up for her husband as eyes remain on her legendary father
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Paulina Gretzky’s heartwarming gesture to her husband comes days after she kept quiet while Wayne Gretzky got trolled



Image via Michael Reaves/Getty Images

Wayne Gretzky ’s older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has now been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, Dustin Johnson , as the two were spotted in Georgia for the Masters Tournament, which began on 10th April. Recently, a picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive Paulina Gretzky has been of her husband’s career.Paulina Gretzky and her husband, Dustin Johnson, were spotted before the tournament began on 10th April as Johnson participated in the Masters Par 3 Contest.Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she wore a white shirt and pants along with white shoes and walked hand in hand with her husband as she carried his golf kit.Both looked happy as the two laughed and were seen speaking to each other. A few days ago, Paulina Gretzky was also seen at LIV Golf Miami to be with her husband. The two took a private jet from Miami and then landed in Augusta, Georgia where the Masters Tournament began from 10th April.The NHL legend, Wayne Gretzky, was last spotted when Alex Ovechkin tied with him at 894 goals. Wayne Gretzky was spotted cheering for Alex Ovechkin as the crowd gave him a standing ovation at the Chicago Blackhawks’ recent match.Wayne Gretzky complimented Alex Ovechkin’s efforts and said, “I can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I’m not sure who’s gonna get more goals than that.”Wayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, “I was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved”.However, Wayne Gretzky’s children have stayed away from all the mess that the NHL legend had found himself in. Paulina Gretzky did not issue any statements when her father was getting trolled as fans believed that he supported Team USA at the 4 Nations.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky flaunts her luxurious life as Wayne Gretzky receives a standing ovation
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, dustin johnson. The two were spotted in augusta, georgia for the masters tournament, which began on 10th april. A picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive she has been of her husband's career.

Article Title: Hockey Operations President Brian MacLellan presents Alex Ovechkin with golden hockey stick, fans question Washington Capitals’ choice of gifts
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin (via Getty Images)


Alex Ovechkin's tribute night ruffles feathers among Washington Capitals fans Ovechkin Makes History, Capitals Make It Special! Wayne Gretzky's Rolls-Royce comment creates unrealistic expectations Alex Ovechkin finally broke Wayne Gretzky's record of 894 goals, and he is now the NHL's all-time leading scorer. The Washington Capitals superstar was honoured with a touching ceremony amidst thousands of cheering fans. But while the franchise lavished gifts and accolades on Alex Ovechkin and his family with the finest luxuries, some fans were left feeling disappointed, particularly following Wayne Gretzky's suggestion of a Rolls-Royce gift that created greater expectations.The Washington Capitals threw everything at their disposal into celebrating Alex Ovechkin's record-breaking accomplishment. The 39-year-old forward, who spent 15 games out of the lineup with a broken leg this season, still broke the NHL all-time goal record.President of Hockey Operations Brian MacLellan gave Alex Ovechkin a full-sized golden hockey stick—engraved and constructed as a one-of-a-kind commemorative piece. The star's sons, Sergei and Ilya Ovechkin, accepted miniature versions of the same stick, while Ted Leonsis distributed luxury watches—Rolexes for Ovi and his mother, and a Cartier for his wife, Anastasia Shubskaya.And to top it all off, the Capitals revealed a sculptural piece of art by Detroit artist TYP. The 6-foot work of art, puck-shaped and sporting actual casts of Ovechkin's skates and stick, brought a three-dimensional element to the tribute. While Ovechkin was visibly emotional, fans were divided in their reactions.“We were there, and the lighting made it look like it was papier-mâché, like a piñata? We thought for sure something was going to pop out. Like football kids through the banner…” a fan said.Some of the backlash came as a result of comments Wayne Gretzky made before the ceremony. “I told Mr. Leonsis, when I broke the record, they got me a Rolls-Royce. So I hope they get you something,” he said.“I really thought after the Gretzky comment that Leonsis was going to toss Ovi keys to a new Rolls-Royce,” another fan shared.Also Read: No more chasing—Alex Ovechkin’s hitting back as Capitals surge to top Alex Ovechkin, however, remained grateful. “It’s such a great moment for me, my family, and the organization, for DC. It’s great,” he said.While fans will certainly bicker over the execution, the moment itself is not in dispute: the history of the game was being written, and the Capital One Arena was perfectly positioned to receive it.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin became the nhl's all-time leading scorer with 894 goals. The washington capitals gave him a golden hockey stick, rolexes and cartier watches. But some fans were left disappointed after wayne gretzky suggested a rolls-royce gift.

Article Title: Ronny Garcia dies at 24 before making his debut with York Revolution
Article Text:
Ronny Garcia dies at 24 before making his debut with York Revolution (Image Source: X)

How did Ronny Garcia begin his career?

Ronny Garcia's experience with York Revolution

Ronny Garcia, the professional Astros pitcher, died in unfortunate circumstances. Ronny Garcia was a minor-league baseball pitcher who spent nearly seven years playing for the Houston Astros . He was awaiting 2024 when he could begin his professional pitching career as a member of the York Revolution . His untimely death was a surprise to his family, friends, and sporting world. All are remembering his diligence and the bright future that lay ahead of him when his life was brutally cut short in a sudden manner.Ronny Garcia belonged to Samana, Dominican Republic. He had played baseball during his childhood and didn't go unnoticed for his skill. A few years back, he was contracted by the Houston Astros' minor league side. Ronny Garcia was hardworking and demonstrated that he belonged to a high caliber. He pitched wonderfully well and convinced others that he was capable of a career in major league baseball.Although he never reached the big leagues with the Astros, he was close. He worked hard and everybody believed he was going to have a good career. His hard work in the minor leagues was about to come into its own, and his future looked excellent.Ronny Garcia made an excellent career move in February 2024, signing a contract with the Atlantic League's York Revolution. This offered him a chance to get into baseball and continue working as a player. Everyone wanted to see him keep reaching for the stars, always hoping he could return to playing big league ball again.Unfortunately, before he could take one more step forward in his professional life, Ronny Garcia's life was brutally ripped away from him. His demise shocked all the individuals because he was too young and had too much to give. The cause of Ronny Garcia's death has not been revealed yet. He was only 24 years old and so full of potential. His death reminds us that life is not predictable.The baseball world and the Houston Astros lost their defeat when Ronny Garcia passed away. Although Ronny Garcia’s dream to achieve success in making it to the big leagues as an Astros player was not completed, he still earned respect from many people with his perseverance. His passing left the baseball community, but his legacy will endure.Also Read: Houston Astros Struggle For Pitching As Spencer Arrighetti Sustains Thumb Injury
Article Summary: Ronny garcia, the professional astros pitcher, died in unfortunate circumstances. Ronny garcia was a minor-league baseball pitcher who spent nearly seven years playing for the houston astros. He was awaiting 2024 when he could begin his professional pitching career as a member of the york revolution.

Article Title: 7 Best Sports games to play on your PS5 in 2025
Article Text:
Image via WWE 2K

1. EA Sports FC 25

2. MLB The Show 25

3. NBA 2K25

4. Madden NFL 25

5. F1 24

6. Gran Turismo 7

7. WWE 2K25

As the gaming world continues to evolve, sports games are pushing the boundaries of realism, gameplay, and fun. With the PlayStation 5 offering powerful hardware and immersive visuals, 2025 is set to be an exciting year for sports enthusiasts. Whether you're into football, basketball, baseball, or racing, here are the top seven sports games you should try on your PS5 this year.The latest edition of EA’s iconic football series, EA Sports FC 25 , is a must-play for soccer fans. Featuring over 19,000 players from over 700 clubs, the game introduces new features such as 5v5 Rush mode and an overhaul of tactical foundations. This allows for greater strategic control and more realistic movements, making the gameplay more dynamic. The game also provides an authentic experience with improved career modes for both players and managers, along with the inclusion of top women’s leagues.Baseball fans are in for a treat with MLB The Show 25. Known for its realistic gameplay, this title has taken things a step further by revamping the Road To The Show mode, allowing players to create their own ballplayer and rise through the ranks. With expanded Diamond Dynasty mode, there are endless opportunities to craft the perfect lineup. It’s a perfect choice for anyone wanting to experience the thrill of baseball at its best, with no time-limited season restrictions.For basketball enthusiasts, NBA 2K25 is the ultimate game to showcase your skills. With the introduction of ProPLAY technology, players’ signature moves have never looked more realistic. The game allows you to create your own legend in the MyCAREER mode, or test your skills in the open-world The City. Whether you're aiming for the top in MyTEAM or hitting the courts for streetball, NBA 2K25 offers an unparalleled experience of NBA action.Madden NFL 25 brings the most authentic American football experience to your PS5. The FieldSENSE* gameplay system delivers a dynamic and realistic physics-based tackling system, letting you dominate the field with more control than ever before. Whether you're shredding defenders or stifling offenses, the next-gen visuals and gameplay mechanics make this game a standout for NFL fans.For racing game aficionados, F1 24 provides the most realistic Formula 1 experience. With the inclusion of the 2024 season’s official cars and drivers, the game offers a true-to-life racing experience. Whether you take on the new Driver Career mode or create your own team in My Team Career mode, F1 24 features authentic handling and physics, making every race feel intense and immersive.For those who crave a more detailed racing simulator, Gran Turismo 7 is a must-play. With over 420 cars to collect and tune, this game offers a variety of modes including Arcade, GT Campaign, and a comprehensive Driving School. The level of car customization and realism in the handling models makes this an essential title for racing enthusiasts who appreciate precision and detail.If you're a fan of professional wrestling, WWE 2K25 offers a thrilling experience both inside and outside the ring. Featuring The Bloodline's Showcase and exciting new match types, the game takes immersion to the next level with its WWE-themed world and live events. The addition of intergender wrestling, barricade diving, and chain wrestling brings fresh energy to the franchise, making it one of the most engaging sports games of 2025.2025 is shaping up to be an exceptional year for sports gaming, and these seven titles showcase the best of what the PS5 has to offer. Whether you’re controlling a football team, racing against the clock, or stepping into the ring, these games deliver high-quality, immersive experiences that every sports gamer will enjoy.
Article Summary: With the playstation 5 offering powerful hardware and immersive visuals, 2025 is set to be an exciting year for sports enthusiasts. Whether you're into football, basketball, baseball, or racing, here are the top seven sports games you should try on your ps5 this year.

Article Title: Bill Belichick acknowledges key mistake in 2018 that impacted New England Patriots’ future
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Bill Belichick reflects on the missed opportunity that changed Patriots’s QB search

Over the course of his distinguished career, Bill Belichick crafted a formidable dynasty with the New England Patriots, solidifying his legacy as one of the NFL's all-time great coaches. Under his direction, particularly during the Tom Brady era, the Patriots were consistently in Super Bowl contention. Yet, despite his many triumphs, Belichick recently confessed to a significant mistake, one that may have had a lasting impact on the team's success.The mistake Bill Belichick referred to goes back to the 2018 season, a year that, despite ending in a Super Bowl win, was filled with behind-the-scenes tension and questionable decisions. One of the most criticized moves was his decision to sideline cornerback Malcolm Butler in Super Bowl LII. The unexpected benching sparked confusion among players and fans alike, and Belichick now admits it may have disrupted the team's chemistry.In a forthcoming book, Bill Belichick reflects on some of the choices he wishes he could revisit one of the most debated being his decision to pass on Lamar Jackson during the 2018 NFL Draft .With the 31st overall pick, the Patriots had a prime opportunity to secure a future star. Instead, they selected running back Sony Michel, while Jackson was scooped up immediately afterward by the Baltimore Ravens. Since then, Jackson has emerged as one of the league’s most explosive quarterbacks, reshaping the Ravens’ offense with his mobility and earning an MVP title along the way.Although Michel made valuable contributions most notably helping the Patriots win their last Super Bowl in the Tom Brady era his long-term impact hasn’t matched Jackson’s game-changing presence. In hindsight, Belichick admits the decision stands out even more sharply, especially given New England's ongoing search for a dependable quarterback after Brady’s exit.Since Brady’s departure, the Patriots have gone through multiple quarterbacks, none of whom have managed to bring lasting stability. Although the rise of Drake Maye has sparked optimism for what’s ahead, there’s still a strong belief that Lamar Jackson could have been the ideal solution to their quarterback struggles.Despite all of Belichick’s accomplishments over the years, passing on Jackson remains a what-if moment, one that might have completely altered the course of the Patriots’ journey in the post-Brady era.Also Read: “I don’t care, and it never ends”: Josh Berry sounds off on Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce obsession As Belichick reflects on his legacy, it's clear that even the most brilliant minds can second-guess their past decisions. While his career is filled with unmatched achievements, the choice to overlook Lamar Jackson in 2018 serves as a reminder that every draft pick can shape a franchise’s future for better or worse. For Patriots fans, it remains a lingering “what could have been” in the story of life after Brady.
Article Summary: Bill belichick reflects on the missed opportunity that changed patriots’s qb search. The new england patriots passed on lamar jackson during the 2018 nfl draft. Jackson has emerged as one of the league's most explosive quarterbacks, reshaping the ravens’ offense with his mobility.

Article Title: Anthony Edwards was cussed out before Minnesota Timberwolves crushed Memphis Grizzlies: “I gotta be better”
Article Text:
Image credit: Getty Images

Minnesota Timberwolves were cussed out by coach at halftime

The Minnesota Timberwolves notched an important 141-125 win over the Memphis Grizzlies on Thursday, with shooting guard Anthony Edwards playing a major role by dropping 44 points. In his postgame interview, Edwards shared how head coach Chris Finch cussed out the team at halftime, lighting a fire that helped them snatch the victory from the Grizzlies. The shift in their defensive intensity after the break was evident on the court.According to SportingNews.com, Edwards said, "We got cussed out at halftime, especially myself, about my effort on defense, so we put emphasis on that side of the court. Gameplan mistakes, myself. I'm talking about blown gameplan mistakes, mental mistakes that I shouldn't be making in five years of experience in the league. I shouldn't make those gameplan mistakes so I gotta be better."Beyond his honest revelation about being cussed out, Edwards was also a riot during a live interview when he playfully interrupted Minnesota star Julius Randle , shouting, "I'm the best in the world! Go tell all the girls!" Randle struggled to continue the interview, laughing and calling Edwards “crazy” in response to the disruption.Speaking with TNT, Edwards also revealed that his trainer sends him motivational videos of Michael Jordan for inspiration. “Hans, my trainer told me to black out tonight, so I tried to do that. We'll be watching, like, I know people are going to love this. He sent me, like, MJ videos every day about, like, blacking out. And I think MJ said something like, why would I worry about a miss if I haven't took the shot yet? So he'd be sending me stuff like that. So I appreciate him.”Also Read: Golden State Warriors regain control of playoff destiny after Memphis Grizzlies fall to Minnesota Timberwolves Thursday’s win gives the Timberwolves a stronger shot at the Western Conference playoffs, as they are now tied with Memphis in the standings. Had they lost, their chances of securing a playoff spot would have taken a major hit. This season, Edwards is averaging 27.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, 4.5 assists, and 1.1 steals per game, while shooting a career-best 39.7 percent from beyond the arc. The wolves are now aiming to clinch victories in their upcoming two games.
Article Summary: Minnesota timberwolves beat memphis grizzlies 141-125 on thursday. Shooting guard anthony edwards dropped 44 points for the wolves. Edwards revealed that coach chris finch cussed out the team at halftime. Edwards also revealed that his trainer sends him motivational videos of michael jordan for inspiration.

Article Title: What is the net worth of Scottie Pippen in 2025? How the former Chicago Bulls star’s financial portfolio dwindled over the years?
Article Text:
Net worth of Scottie Pippen in 2025 (Image Source: Instagram/scottiepippen )

What is Scottie Pippen's Net Worth in 2025?

Scottie Pippen has played in the NBA for 17 seasons and has six NBA Championship wins under his belt. The athlete is considered to be one of the greatest small forwards in NBA history. Additionally, his achievements include being one of the two players in history who have won an Olympic Gold Medal and an NBA title twice in the same year. After earning great fame and recognition, we are taking a look at how this has impacted his financial portfolio.According to Celebrity Net Worth, Scottie Pippen has a net worth of $20 million. This comes after playing with the Chicago Bulls for 12 seasons, with the Houston Rockets for one season and the Portland Trail Blazers for four seasons. After all the achievements and accolades, his net worth is not as high as his peers. This comes after the star is known to be one of the most underpaid players of all time. He signed a 7-year contract with the Bulls for $18 million. Thus, when the Bulls were at their peak and Michael Jordan would earn $30+ million annually, Pippen would only earn $2.6 million.However, his contract with the Houston Rockets earned him a staggering $67.2 million. Post this, when he joined the Bulls during the last two years of his career, he earned $10 million. While he has earned over $109 million over the years as an NBA player, his net worth has diminished massively.Pippen's net worth also accounted to numerous brand endorsements. He had signed a deal with Avia early in his career. Post this he had also signed a contract with Nike. Other popular brand endorsements include Frito-Lay, McDonald's, Coca Cola, Right Guard and Visa.However, bad financial decisions have dwindled his net worth to $20 million. He lost $20 million due to his financial advisor, who turned out to be a fraud. Additionally, Pippen has eight children and had to pay child support for each of them. The court had ordered him to pay half of his retirement fund from the Chicago Bulls as a divorce settlement. This also had a severe blow to his net worth. He also had to support his family of 12 siblings as his father was paralyzed due to a stroke.Also Read: Exploring the personal life of Scottie Pippen
Article Summary: Scottie pippen has played in the nba for 17 seasons and has six nba championship wins under his belt. The athlete is considered to be one of the greatest small forwards in nba history. However, bad financial decisions have dwindled his net worth to $20 million. He had to support his family of 12 siblings as his father was paralyzed due to a stroke.

Article Title: MS Dhoni to lead CSK, Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of IPL 2025 with broken elbow
Article Text:
MS Dhoni and CSK head coach Stephen Fleming (Photo: BCCI/IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Which team will win the upcoming match: CSK or KKR? KKR CSK

Are CSK making the best use of Jadeja?

CHENNAI: There was much drama in the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) camp on the eve of their must-win game against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). Ruturaj Gaikwad , who was hit by a Tushar Deshpande delivery in the game against Rajasthan Royals in Guwahati last week, appears to have a broken elbow.“Ruturaj has been ruled out of the rest of the IPL with a broken elbow. And now a certain uncapped player called MS Dhoni will lead us,” coach Stephen Fleming said.Gaikwad hasn’t been at his best and it will be interesting to see if CSK go back to senior player Rahul Tripathi at the top of the order or throw in one of the rookies — Shaikh Rashid or Andre Siddarth — into the deep end.Asked whether it was difficult to make Dhoni take up the captaincy again, Fleming said, “No, he understood the situation. Ruturaj didn’t want to go but it’s an unfortunate situation.”The injury complicates an already complicated situation for CSK, who have only one win out of five. Another loss here on Friday may just make the uphill road to playoffs qualification all the more difficult. But then, their opponents KKR aren’t exactly better off either.The defending champions have won only two of their five matches and it’s extremely important that they take full points here. There’s one thing, though, that may just help the Knight Riders at the MA Chidambaram Stadium — the pitch. They have complained a lot about their home pitch at the Eden, but here, their spinners might get the purchase they are looking for.For a long time, one of the centrepieces of Chennai Super Kings’ success has been Ravindra Jadeja. It was his consistency over the years that made CSK shell out Rs 18 cr to retain him. However, in the five games that CSK have played so far, it seems that their former captain has been underutilised to a degree.In none of the games did the experienced left-arm spinner get his full quota of four overs. In 13 of the 20 available overs that he bowled, Jadeja gave away 105 runs, going at an economy rate of 8.“We have six options. It’s not a set stage for anybody, we try to go according to the situation,” coach Fleming said on Thursday.Meanwhile, as a batter too, Jadeja has been limited to the role of a finisher at a time when the top order has struggled.“We really like his partnership with MS at the back end. That appeals to us,” Fleming said.
Article Summary: Ruturaj gaikwad has been ruled out of the rest of the ipl with a broken elbow. Ms dhoni will lead the chennai super kings (csk) against kolkata knight riders (kkr) csk have won only two of their five matches.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after RCB vs DC match
Article Text:
(Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Do you believe Delhi Capitals can maintain their unbeaten streak? No, they will face tougher competition Yes, they have strong momentum

NEW DELHI: Delhi Capitals continued their dominant run in the 2025 Indian Premier League (IPL), securing a comprehensive six-wicket win over Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) on Thursday to maintain their unbeaten streak in the tournament. With this win, Delhi Capitals are solidifying their position in second place on the points table.Delhi are now one of just two teams with four wins, the other being table-toppers Gujarat Titans. However, Gujarat hold the top spot due to a slightly superior net run rate of +1.413 compared to Delhi’s +1.278. Both teams have eight points, but Delhi have played one match fewer.Royal Challengers Bengaluru, despite the loss, retained third place in the standings with six points from five matches. Their net run rate of +0.539 keeps them narrowly ahead of the fourth-placed Punjab Kings, who also have six points but a net run rate of +0.289.Lucknow Super Giants, with three wins from five games as well, are in fifth position with a net run rate of +0.078.The IPL 2025 points table is beginning to take shape as teams enter the middle phase of the tournament. While the top five sides—Gujarat, Delhi, Bengaluru, Punjab, and Lucknow—are starting to create some separation from the rest, the competition remains intense in the mid-table.Kolkata Knight Riders (4 points), Rajasthan Royals (4 points), and Mumbai Indians (2 points) are still very much in the hunt, though they need to build momentum quickly.Mumbai’s net run rate is only slightly negative at -0.010, suggesting that a couple of solid wins could catapult them into the top half of the table.Chennai Super Kings, with one win and a net run rate of -0.889, find themselves in ninth place, while Sunrisers Hyderabad are struggling at the bottom with just one win and a worrying net run rate of -1.629 after five games.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals beat royal challengers bengaluru by six wickets on thursday. Delhi are now one of just two teams with four wins in the ipl 2025. Gujarat titans hold the top spot due to a slightly superior net run rate of +1.413 compared to delhi’s -1.278.

Article Title: “It's kind of funny”- Dodgers 2B Tommy Edman reacts hilariously on being compared to Mike Trout and Aaron Judge
Article Text:
“It's kind of funny”- Dodgers 2B Tommy Edman reacts hilariously on being compared to Mike Trout and Aaron Judge (Image Source: Instagram)

Dodgers star Tommy Edman reacts hilariously on being compared to Mike Trout and Aaron Judge

Dodgers postgame: Tommy Edman reacts to tying MLB home run lead

"Yeah, it's kind of a lot of guys that look the same, and then there's me. It's kind of funny, but it's kind of a hot start, and we'll see how long I can keep it up."

The Los Angeles Dodgers ’ second baseman, Tommy Edman, has added a new feather to his cap of achievements. Edman stands along with some of the most prominent A-listers, including the Los Angeles Angels’ star Mike Trout and Yankees captain Aaron Judge , due to his home run record. The Dodgers’ utility player is 29 and has a long way to go in the world of major league baseball. This newly earned achievement and a comparison with the leading baseball athletes have brought Tommy Edman into the spotlight.Edman even reacted to the comparison in a hilarious way.Back in 2024, when the Los Angeles Dodgers added former St. Louis Cardinals star Tommy Edman to their roster, they had no idea that it would end up being one of the best trades for them. Recently, the Dodgers’ second baseman, Tommy Edman, was compared with the baseball icon, all thanks to his home runs.Reportedly, Edman was compared to Los Angeles Angels star Mike Trout, New York Yankees captain Aaron Judge, and Philadelphia Phillies left fielder Kyle Schwarber as he went on to score the same number of home runs during the ongoing major league season.According to the statistics, Tommy Edman managed to secure six home runs while representing the Los Angeles Dodgers during the 2025 MLB season . Yankees star Aaron Judge, Mike Trout, and former Chicago Cubs star Kyle Schwarber have scored 6 home runs and have tied for the position along with Dodgers second baseman Tommy Edman.Edman reacted to his newly achieved feat and his comparison with Mike Trout and Aaron Judge. During the post game interview, with the media outlet Dodger Blue, Tommy Edman found the comparison very hilarious, and said-Reportedly, during a recent game against the Chicago Cubs, Tommy Edman went on to smash three home runs, which led to providing the much-needed lead to the Los Angeles Dodgers. His stint with the St. Louis Cardinals is quite remarkable, as his home run mark reached 13 back in 2023.Also Read: “Means the world to me”- Dodgers’ pitching star Dustin May gets emotional after returning to big league mound
Article Summary: Tommy edman was compared to mike trout and aaron judge due to his home run record. The los angeles dodgers’ utility player is 29 and has a long way to go in the world of major league baseball. During a recent game against the chicago cubs, tommy edman went on to smash three home runs, which led to providing the much-needed lead.
